CustomField.description: Offeror declaration if the RLP contains seismic requirements.
CustomField.label: Offeror Seismic Declaration

value.fullName: The RLP does not contain seismic requirements. No documentation required The RLP contains seismic requirements.
value.label: The RLP does not contain seismic requirements. No documentation required The RLP contains seismic requirements.

value.fullName: Fully meets seismic requirements or meets an exemption under the RLP
value.label: Fully meets seismic requirements or meets an exemption under the RLP

value.fullName: Does not meet seismic requirements, but will be retrofitted to meet seismic requirements
value.label: Does not meet seismic requirements, but will be retrofitted to meet seismic requirements

value.fullName: Will be constructed to meet seismic requirements
value.label: Will be constructed to meet seismic requirements
